text: Campione d'Italia is a comune in the Province of Como in Lombardy, Italy. As of 31 March 2019, 1,961 people lived there. Its area is 0.91 kmÂ². It is 273 meters above sea level. It is an exclave surrounded by the Swiss canton of Ticino and is on the eastern shore of Lake Lugano. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Settlements in Como Category:Exclaves
title: Campione d'Italia
